title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 37 - Procedure When Patients Leave Without Notice To The Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 37 - Procedure When Patients Leave Without Notice To The Facility

State Regulations
§ 37.1 - Patients held pursuant to the family court act
§ 37.2 - Patients in state-operated psychiatric facilities
§ 37.3 - Notices to family and others
§ 37.4 - Patients deemed dangerous
§ 37.5 - Patients deemed not dangerous
§ 37.6 - Status changes
§ 37.7 - Seeking assistance in case of possible physical harm
§ 37.8 - Voluntary, informal and nonobjecting patients
§ 37.9 - Encouragement of outpatient services
§ 37.13 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 37

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§7.09, 9.01, 29.01, 29.16, 31.04

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
